TopicTitle: HELP! Need mod to delete parts IN FLIGHT! CRAP DECOUPLERS PROBLEM!

Articles.Content: I just love creating stuff and spending 40 hours building crafts only to find the parts wont decouple........EVEN AFTER THEY WERE TESTED AT KERBIN. So im asking is there a mod that would let my right click delete parts in mid flight? Ive tried Chop It but that mod makes you have Kerbals . Im launching Duna Precursors and thats not suppose to be manned.
try right clicking the decoupler. or using whack-a-kerbal.

> 
> try right clicking the decoupler. or using whack-a-kerbal.

I might suggest asking if he is using mechjeb first BEFORE suggesting whack a kerbal

im using mechjeb, but how is that going to help?

- - - Updated - - -

OMG!@!! YOUR A GENIOUS!! WACK O KERBAL so worked. At first I was scared cuz I thought it would have just destroyed other parts as sort of collateral damage. But all is well!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-23T08:01:13Z" title="02/23/2015 08:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 23, 2015</time> by lextacy**

> 
> I might suggest asking if he is using mechjeb first BEFORE suggesting whack a kerbal

Please, enlighten me on how MechJeb is related to the original problem ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-23T14:12:29Z" title="02/23/2015 02:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 23, 2015</time> by sarbian**

Try [Kaboom](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105026) which doesn't require Kerbals.

Also see these posts:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35777-Can-t-Undock-Bug-How-To-Fix](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35777-Can-t-Undock-Bug-How-To-Fix)

[http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2do41j/spaceplane_cargo_and_docking/cjrhy1r](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2do41j/spaceplane_cargo_and_docking/cjrhy1r)

> 
> Please, enlighten me on how MechJeb is related to the original problem ?

not part of the original problem, just part of the Whack a Kerbal fix
Whack a Kerbal is a stock feature.
I was unaware of that! \*looks rather sheepish\*
wacko kerbal seems to not work in space , but only on ground .....anyone else having that problem?
On the off chance do you have Kerbal Joint Reinforcement? If so check out the latest in that mods thread for decoupler fix.
